question: What are PPC Packages?
answer:
PPC packages are collections of PPC services and pricing options offered by PPC agencies. These packages can include several services that can help you achieve different goals.
Many PPC agencies also offer several tiers and options that enable you to customize your pay-per-click package to best suit your goals and needs.
